title: Create task template system for common workflows
description: Allow users to define task templates with default fields, descriptions, and checklists. Support quick task creation from templates. Include built-in templates for bug reports, features, and documentation.

title: Improve async operations and user feedback
description: Use vim.notify for better async feedback, add progress indicators for long-running operations (sync, list loading). Implement cancellation support and timeout handling.

title: Add advanced filtering by priority, status, and assignee
description: Implement task filtering in the UI to allow users to filter the task list by priority (P1, P2, P3), status (open, in_progress, closed), and assignee. Should support combining multiple filters.

title: Implement theme support with customizable highlight colors
description: Add highlight groups for different task priorities and statuses. Allow users to customize colors in their configuration. Support dark and light theme variants.

title: Implement integrations with external issue trackers
description: Add support for syncing with GitHub Issues, GitLab Issues, and JIRA. Allow mapping Beads tasks to external issues. Support bidirectional sync with pull/push operations.

title: Handle real-time sync with Beads daemon
description: Implement integration with Beads daemon for real-time updates. Handle file watching in .beads/ directory and refresh UI when tasks change. Support offline mode gracefully.

title: Add statusline/tabline integration
description: Display Beads information in the statusline or tabline, such as: task count, sync status, currently selected task ID, last sync time. Support both lualine and custom statusline formats.

title: Implement task detail view with editor integration
description: Create a detailed view for individual tasks showing full description, comments, and metadata. Integrate with Neovim's buffer API to allow editing task details directly.

title: Integrate fuzzy finder for task search
description: Add integration with fzf.lua or telescope.nvim to provide fuzzy search capability for finding and selecting tasks quickly. Should support searching by ID, title, description, and status.

title: Add commands for task management (create, close, update)
description: Implement Neovim commands: :Beads (list), :BeadsCreate (new task), :BeadsClose (complete), :BeadsUpdate (modify). Integrate with the CLI module from issue nvim-beads-icl.

title: Implement Beads CLI integration module
description: Create Lua modules to wrap Beads CLI commands (bd ready, bd show, bd create, bd close, bd update). This module should handle spawning processes, parsing JSON output, and providing Lua-friendly interfaces.

title: Build task list UI component for Neovim
description: Build a floating window or split-based UI to display the task list. Should show task IDs, titles, status, and priority. Allow filtering/searching through tasks.

title: Set up basic plugin structure and init.lua
description: Create the basic directory structure (lua/, plugin/, doc/) and initialize init.lua with plugin loading logic. This should establish the plugin entry point and basic setup.

title: Add task list caching and performance optimization
description: Implement client-side caching of task list between syncs to reduce CLI overhead. Add debouncing for rapid commands. Support incremental updates instead of full refreshes.

title: Implement keymaps and user configuration
description: Define default keymaps for common operations (open list, create task, close task). Support user customization through setup() function. Follow Neovim plugin conventions.

title: Add tests and documentation for plugin
description: Write unit tests for core modules, integration tests for CLI wrapping, and documentation in doc/beads.txt. Update README with usage examples and configuration options.
